name: Candy Quest Demo V1
description:
CANDY QUEST DEMO V1

Controls:

(Gameboy / Keyboard)

  • D-Pad / Arrow Keys: Move
  • A / Z: Jump
  • B / X:  Attack
  • B / X: Burst - Hold Then Release
  • Start / Enter: Pause

Candy Quest is a Halloween-themed collectathon/platformer mashup Gameboy game.  This current demo features the main story introduction and tutorial, as well as the whole first world, the Frightful Forest. Candy Quest is still a WIP game, so expect to see more updates featuring new levels/worlds/other content in the future!

Follow the four Pumpkids, PPK, GPK, YPK, and RPK, along their quest to collect as much candy as possible before Halloween night ends!

On Halloween night, the four Pumpkids find their plans to go trick-or-treating interrupted by a sudden summoning from the Pumpking. He's made a breakthrough in his research of the Potion of Sugarious, a magical potion is said to bestow great powers to whoever drinks it. 

The four Pumpkids are tasked with setting up a ritual to allow the Pumpking to brew the potion. They must light the four Candles of Sucrosia that are scattered across the land, and gather as much special candy as they can in order to make the potion as powerful as possible. However, they only have until the end of Halloween night before their chance to create the Potion of Sugarious slips away.

Will the Pumpkids be able to light the candles in time? Will they collect enough candy to brew the strongest potion of all? Put your platforming skills to the test and find out in Candy Quest!
